price: А на Дан кад их Он позове и упита: “Где су они које сте поред Менe обожавали?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
